It's located within walking distance to the beach, shops, and restaurants. Located adjacent to the brand new Beach Walk Hotel on the Intracoastal side. title: palm beach point
description: 9 to 12 large matted stalls (12x12) available, conveniently located for optional hacking distance to both WEF and the Ridge horse shows. Set on 5 acres with a private, cul-de-sac location in the exclusive gated community of Palm Beach Point. This first class equestrian facility includes a riding arena suitable for dressage or jumping, and 6 grass paddocks. The barn is equipped with fly system, security cameras. Air-conditioned tack room w/ bathroom, washer dryer and mini kitchen. Apartment availAdditional apartment for barn manager or groom housing available for additional cost. Apartment features kitchen and private bathroom overlooking views of grassy paddocks. Individual stall watering, individual fan system per stall, and individual fly system. Matted wash rack with cold and hot water.

title: Century Village East

Century Village has all the amenities one could hope for....1,700 seat theater, fitness center. 17 pools (one is indoor), tennis, courtesy shuttle, game and card rooms, pickle ball, & 20 billiard tables. title: Century Village Deerfield
description: Beautiful updated 1/1 on 2nd floor(no lift) INCLUDING !INTERNET! This renovated, clean condo features porcelain floors throughout, updated kitchen with granite counter tops and white appliances (range, refrigerator w/ice maker,microwave, dishwasher), disposal, large hall closet, 2 flat screen tv's, sofa bed in living room,queen bed in master bedroom, enclosed patio and WIFI INCLUDED! Steps to pool, Hillsboro gate and plaza. Available 3-6 .months with 4-6 month rental we can negotiate price.

title: SHORE CLUB APTS B & C CONDO
description: Great building on the Intracoastal waterway near awesome shopping centers and parks, This is an active 55+ community with a social clubhouse, heated salt system pool and bbq grills, Minutes to the beautiful NPB golf and country club, fabulous restaurants, shopping, I-95, and PBIA,

title: LOXAHATCHEE GROVES
description: THIS IS A HORSE STALL NOT AN APARTMENT OR ROOM. Very clean property that attracts long-term tenants and we are almost always full year round. Large riding arena with jumps, round pen with GGT footing, 12X12 stalls and 2 stalls are 16X11, and 2-stall are 10X11. 13 grass turnouts, fly spray system, GIT manure removal, plenty of security to make your stay clean-- enjoyable--and peaceful. Only a 10 minutes drive to WEF. ''It is magical how peaceful this place is and the owner is meticulous but easy to work with'' --previous seasonal tenant. 18 total stalls please call for what is available.     Horses are happy and safe here!

title: WHITEHALL CONDO AT CAMINO REAL

PERFECTLY SITUATED BETWEEN FORT LAUDERDALE AIRPORT & PALM BEACH INT'L AIRPORT

title: Hidden Woods Of Deer Cree
description: Beautiful second floor fully furnished condo with screened balcony off living rm and both guest and master bedroom. Lots of closet space. Full size washer/dryer in the condo.

This condo is comfortable for 1 or 2 persons and has all the bells and whistles. Balcony views of both Ocean and City. Queen bed in master and washer/dryer in unit. Amenities include new fitness center, community gourmet kitchen, elevator, community rooms, billiard and card room, renovated pool and pool deck and brand new beach walkover.

title: TCPB CONDO
description: Great rental community, Fully furnished apartment, everything included, bring your toothbrush

description: Available for annual lease as of JULY 2021! Leisure Gardens offers a community pool, shuffleboard, putting green and a BBQ area. This tastefully FURNISHED unit features new floors, a newer kitchen and impact windows and doors. From your living room and glassed patio you are overlooking the pool and garden area. Dock rentals available on request and subject to availability.Laundry facilities on the same floor.

This 2 bed and 1 bath corner unit is conveniently located on the first floor in the tranquil neighborhood of Knollridge with an assigned parking space directly in front of unit. Located just 1.5 miles from the beach, access to restaurants, shopping centers and grocery stores are just minutes away. 55 + community, at least one must be 55 and the other occupants must be 18 years or older. Seasonal rental for minimum of 3 months and maximum of 6 months. Availability subject to change.

Cable and high speed internet are included. Impact windows. Ceramic and laminate flooring. Covered 01 parking space. Two 40-in TVs installed.

Enjoy adult active community with wonderful amenities. indoor Olympic size pool, fitness center, volley ball, tennis, shuffle board, bocce ball, pickle ball, movies, theater, classes, card room, billiards, social activities galore, free transportation and more. title: Golden Bay Lodge Co-Op
description: Beautifully decorated and updated apartment with all new furniture. This is 55 plus community. You walk in the apartment and feel that nobody has lived here after renovations. The electric, cable and internet are included in a rent price. Please call and text listing agent for showing instructions.

description: Beautifully Furnished Third floor condo overlooking golf course and water. Two bedroom with option for a third bedroom area or office or family room. 'THE BEST KEPT SECRET IN BROWARD COUNTY'

Granite countertops in the kitchen and Bathroom, White shaker style cabinets, New appliances, Impact windows and doors, High ceilings throughout, Brand new A/C and water Heater, Washer and dryer in unit, 24 hour gated security, Pet friendly. description: Looking for a tropical getaway? This one bedroom, one bath, first floor condo is waiting for you. Indoor and outdoor pools, fitness center, main clubhouse, tennis, courtesy bus and more! Nice private location. Close to downtown West Palm Beach, shopping, dining, and beaches. No smoking and No Pets allowed.

description: SEASONAL 4 PLUS MONTHS GARDEN VIEW WITHIN 2 FEET OF THE ELEVATOR. FULLY FURNISHED 2 BEDROOM APARTMENT .2nd Bedroom has Sleeper Sofa,   EQUIPED WITH CABLE AND INTERNET INCLUDED.  TENANT PAYS ELECTRIC AND WATER. LARGE LAUNDRY ROOM WITH FULL SIZE WASHER AND DRYER.    **NO SHOWINGS TILL MAY 1ST SORRY CURRENTLY RENTED **

title: Galt Towers Condo
description: Spacious and bright 1 BR/1.5 BA with large balcony condo on the ocean available for a seasonal rental now thru Dec 30th, 2021. Enjoy beachfront property with direct access to beach. Many building amenities heated pool, state of the art gym, 2 BBQ's, library, social room, wifi and more. Unit features King bed with ensuite, walk in closets, utilities included (water, electric, cable). Walking distance to Lauderdale by the Sea Pier, restaurants and shops. Supermarket, Shopping, CVS, restaurants conveniently located on Galt Ocean Mile. Unit available for a minimum of 3 months. Renter's insurance is required by the tenant per the association.

title: HOLLYWOOD CENTRAL REACH
description: Furnished Bungalow on the Ocean! Literally few steps to the beach. ! Bedroom 2 Bathrooms with King Size, Living area and kitchen fully equipped. Total Beach lifestyle cozy and private. 1 Parking space assigned. Walk to Tiki Bar, State Parks and fish on the bay or the Ocean. Price includes water and electricity. Small Pets subject to owner approval.

title: CASTLE BEACH CLUB CONDO
description: BEAUTIFUL RENOVATED ONE BEDROOM ONE FULL BATHROOM AT THE CASTLE BEACH HOTEL IN THE HEART OF MIAMI BEACH. UNIT IS FULLY EQUIPPED.ONE PARKING INCLUDED. $150 FINAL CLEANING FEE . ENJOY A RESORT STYLE LIVING RIGHT ON THE OCEAN.AVAILABLE STARTING JUNE 6TH,2021.Equal Housing Opportunity.

title: Voyager Condo
description: This lease is a 4 MONTH LEASE ONLY - beginning July 1, 2021 and ending October 31, 2021. Spacious Southeast facing 2/2 with awesome Intracoastal views from open balcony. Enjoy summertime just a block from the beach. Just a block over Intracoastal bridge to beachfront tiki bar and restaurants. Only 1 mile to one of South Florida's best beachfront fun spots at the end of Atlantic Blvd. in Pompano Beach. Awesome boardwalk with new restaurants, bars, kiddie playground and so much more. Condo has in-unit full size washer/dryer, and tons of guest parking. Oversized resort style heated pool at waters edge and state of the art bbq area with bar. Million dollar lifestyle for a whole lot less!

title: CITYPLACE SOUTH TOWER CONDO
description: Water, basic cable, Internet and trash removal included in rent. Gorgeous 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom on the 17th floor of City Place South Tower with amazing city and Clear Lake views. Building amenities include fully equipped spa and fitness center with sauna, 9th floor club deck with a resort-style pool, grill, outdoor party room, Wi-Fi access throughout, party lounge including billiard area, catering kitchen, video gaming center, and large flat screen TV's. The building is located in the center of a vibrant community known for its local art scene, world-class performing arts, internationally renowned restaurants and shops, and pristine waterways.
